comment: Part 12 in [Baer] p. 49. The map from vectors to functionals with closed kernels maps one-to-one onto. Combined with ~ hdmapadd , this shows the map is an automorphism from the additive group of vectors to the additive group of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
